item.title: How can i make a bow hit 2 times at once [dodian]
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

if your bow already has special then you

public void darkbow() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(45); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; <==== put that at 1 or 0 resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(45); SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(45); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamg(50); SpecialDelay -= 3; } }
